overview:
George Popescu is the founder and Chief Executive Officer of Boston Technologies. He concentrates on all areas of business development and product innovation. Boston Technologies’ success can be directly attributed to George’s ability to engineer creative and robust solutions that cater to the specific needs of banks, brokerages and hedge funds. George’s expertise uniquely allows him to maximize flexibility in an increasingly demanding marketplace for scalable real-time technology solutions.

Under his leadership, Boston Technologies has dramatically broadened its product offerings as George has transformed the organization from a start-up to a global enterprise.

Prior to founding Boston Technologies, George worked for Accenture, in Paris, France. He obtained his Master’s Degree in Electrical Engineering and Computer Sciences from Supelec in France; his Master’s in Nanosciences from Paris XI University in 2005; and his Masters of Sciences from Massachusetts Institute of Technology in 2007. He is currently based out of the Boston Technologies global headquarters in Boston, Massachusetts.
